modName: Realistic ENB-FXAA hybrid for Skyrim - Winter edition
summary: ENBSeries and FXAA Post Process Injector Mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is my ENB-FXAA config to skyrim

INSTALLATION:
Extract files in your main Skyrim directory.

Set bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
Set fGamma=1.0000
Set bFXAAEnabled=0

Tips

Too much blur:
Edit skyrimPrefs.ini and set:
iRadialBlurLevel=0
bDoDepthOfField=0

Too bright sky:
Uninstall any sun textures you have in your /skyrim/data/textures/sky directory.

And install 
True Darker Nights v45 optional darkest nights.esp 

Dungeons:
Install RL - Interior dungeons.esp and Real Effect Candle mod.

=========================================================================================

Recommend mods:

Alternative Snow
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6086

Real Effect Candle 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7643

Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing (optional RL - Interior dungeons.esp only).
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323

Lush grass
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3288

True Darker Nights v45 (optional darkest nights.esp only)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2896

=========================================================================================

Credits:
Boris Vorontsov (ENB)
Timothy Lottes (FXAA)
Some dude
BeetleatWar1977
[DKT70]
Violator
fpedace

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
author: Obliver
